entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
